entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 60%

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h late in the afternoon. High 9. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
